name: Star Project-Yoon
description:
♥♥The sweetest FREE game in the world finally came to you!!♥♥

What happens when a country boy dreaming of an entertainer
meets 'you', an entertainment business CEO&manager full of guts?!

Nurturing and dating at the same time!
Debut brilliantly with a wannabe star 'yoon'!
Beautiful illustration and heart-throbbing romance with you!

■From the striking home drama, to the tough action movie!
Nurture 'Yoon' to become a hot celebrity, with various TV and CF appearance!

■Hey, I take care of my boy's fashion!
Decorate your 'Yoon' with more than 100 theme/seasonal dresses!

■ Sweet love story!
Sense a sweet sentiment every time 'Yoon' levels up!
Collect precious stories with 'Yoon', full of reminiscence!

■ Heart-throbbing date!
Heart-fluttering dating time after tiring broadcasting schedule!
What story will 'Yoon' tell me this time?!

Build a lovely reminiscence with your Idol,
Right now at Star Project-Yoon!

※ The game data is saved in your device, so please note that all the data will be deleted when the game is uninstalled.
